positionSourceConfig.title: Position Source Configuration
positionSourceConfig.description: Configuration for a position source that drives timeline position

systemName.title: System Name
systemName.description: Name of the position source class to instantiate

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: CSS selector for sources that need a DOM element

tickInterval.title: Tick Interval
tickInterval.description: Interval between position updates in milliseconds (RafPositionSource)

verticalMode.title: Vertical Mode
verticalMode.description: Behavior of Up/Down arrow keys (KeyboardStepSource). 'timeline-switch' emits timeline change requests, 'chapter-navigation' jumps between markers, 'disabled' ignores vertical keys

stepSize.title: Step Size
stepSize.description: Position increment for Left/Right arrow keys in seconds (KeyboardStepSource)

largeStepSize.title: Large Step Size
largeStepSize.description: Position increment for Shift+Left/Right arrow keys in seconds (KeyboardStepSource)

markers.title: Markers
markers.description: Marker positions for chapter navigation mode in seconds (KeyboardStepSource). Auto-sorted ascending on init

targetElement.title: Target Element
targetElement.description: Element to scope keyboard bindings to. Can be HTMLElement or CSS selector string (KeyboardStepSource). If not provided, bindings are global

wrapNavigation.title: Wrap Navigation
wrapNavigation.description: Whether navigation wraps at boundaries (KeyboardStepSource). When true, stepping past end wraps to start and vice versa

containerProviderConfig.title: Container Provider Configuration
containerProviderConfig.description: Configuration for a container provider that manages DOM elements

systemName.title: System Name
systemName.description: Name of the container provider class to instantiate

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: CSS selector for the container element

playlistConfig.title: Playlist Configuration
playlistConfig.description: Configuration for a playlist that manages collections of items

systemName.title: System Name
systemName.description: Name of the playlist class to instantiate

identifierKey.title: Identifier Key
identifierKey.description: Property key used to identify items

title: RAF Timeline Provider Settings
description: Settings for animation-type timeline providers using RequestAnimationFrame
